special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, Into Akoum deals 1 damage to each battle you control.
[b]4 Defense[/b] Stage 2
Whenever a creature you control attacks a battle, Into Akoum deals 1 damage to defending player.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
Whenever you defeat a battle, Into Akoum deals 3 damage to each opponent.
